    public class MenuBar
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar

      • MenuBar

        public MenuBar(javax.swing.Action[] anActionArray,
       PaintPanel aPPanel)
        Parameters:
        anActionArray - is the array of actions being passed from DoodleGUI class.
        aPPanel - is the panel that everything is painted on and is what we are setting myPPanel equal to.
